p: Standard t-test and two-way ANOVA to investigate the interaction and main effects with post hoc Bonferroni analyses were conducted where appropriate. Violations of homogeneity of variance resulted in the use of Welch's correction. Violations of normality resulted in the indicated transformation or use of non-parametric alternative tests. Differences were considered significant if P ≤ 0.05. Data are means ± standard errors.
